replies.body: I pretty sure you're allowed to swear, as long as it's not excessive or directed at another player. Therefore the first situation shouldn't have a punishment. However, if the player said "f*ck you" to the person that shot him into the void, that would be a different case. And unless they person is spamming it in the second situation, I'm pretty sure they would just get verbally warned. Again, unless the punishment system changed, to my knowledge, this is what would happen.
